tests.name: Pair Behavior
tests.desc: The equals sign (used on both sides) should permit delimiter changes.

tests.name: Special Characters
tests.desc: Characters with special meaning regexen should be valid delimiters.

tests.name: Sections
tests.desc: Delimiters set outside sections should persist.

tests.name: Inverted Sections
tests.desc: Delimiters set outside inverted sections should persist.

tests.name: Surrounding Whitespace
tests.desc: Surrounding whitespace should be left untouched.

tests.name: Standalone Tag
tests.desc: Standalone lines should be removed from the template.

tests.name: Indented Standalone Tag
tests.desc: Indented standalone lines should be removed from the template.

tests.name: Pair with Padding
tests.desc: Superfluous in-tag whitespace should be ignored.
